metadata.title: CVE-2022-20132 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - low
metadata.description:
In lg_probe and related functions of hid-lg.c and other USB HID files,there is a possible out of bounds read due to improper input validation.This could lead to local information disclosure if a malicious USB HIDdevice were plugged in, with no additional execution privileges needed.User interaction is not needed for exploitation.Product: AndroidVersions:Android kernelAndroid ID: A-188677105References: Upstream kernel

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-20132` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-6.5.0-9-generic - 6.5.0-9.9
